structure.unit: ARTICLE IX. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT

text.section:
Sec. 8A-216. Non-vocal communications, etc.
Every person engaged in the business of owning or operating telegraph systems and any other non vocal message communications such as cablegram, paging services (beepers), electronic mail, and facsimile transmission service shall pay a local business tax as provided for in the schedule of taxes, to the Tax Collector for each place of business.
